alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Iberia, northwestern St. Martin and eastern St. Landry Parishes through 800 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Melville to Lydia. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Catahoula, St. Martinville, Krotz Springs, Melville, Henderson, Loreauville, Butte La Rose, Cecilia, Lydia, Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, Atchafalaya Welcome Center, Lake Fausse Pointe and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 114 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
